Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rumbling \Rum"bling\, a. & n. from {Rumble}, v. i. [1913 Webster]

rumbling adj : continuous full and low-pitched throbbing sound; "the rumbling rolling sound of thunder" [syn: {grumbling}] n : a loud low dull continuous noise; "they heard the rumbling of thunder" [syn: {rumble}, {grumble}, {grumbling}]
